document_data.name: Bay of Balduran
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bay of Balduran''' was a large bay in southeast [[Anchorome]]. The bay was named after the explorer [[Balduran]], who was known as the first [[Faer√ªnian]] to set foot on the continent.
document_data.Geography:
The bay was located at the mouth of a river, along the coast of Anchorome north of [[Kultaka]]. It opened into the [[Trackless Sea]].

The only settlement along the bay was [[Fort Flame]], a small colony of [[Flaming Fist]] mercenaries commanded by [[Bellan]].
document_data.History: The bay was named in the {{YearlinkName|1364}} by the survivors of a Flaming Fist expedition commissioned by [[Eltan]] with the objective of exploring Anchorome. The explorers established the settlement of Flaming Fort and also named the surrounding region [[Balduran (region)|Balduran]].
